description: Notably, the Mazda MX-5 Miata has long enjoyed an above-average reliability rating, with some model years ranking higher than others. For example, RepairPal gave the 2021 model year a 4 out of 5 reliability rating, placing it 8th out of 21 for subcompact cars, while J.D.Power scored the 2019 model 73 out of 100

From racetrack legend to modern-day classic. To Porsche, 718 is more than a number. It stands for winning, excellence and performance. The name of a game-changing race car that's inspired two acclaimed modern sports cars the 718 Cayman GTS 4.0 and 718 Boxster GTS 4.0.

For the thrill-seekers and track-enthusiasts, Toyota has offered a twin-scroll turbocharged 3.0-liter inline six-cylinder engine in the 2022 GR Supra 3.0 trim level. This engine produces a whopping 382 hp of power and 368 lb. -ft. of torque, enabling the sports car to zoom to 60 mph in just 3.9 seconds.

The balanced trim with plenty of must-have features. 2022 TUCSON Plug-in Hybrid. 33-mile All-Electric Range based on a fully charged battery pack and 80 MPGe. MPGe is the EPA-equivalent measure of gasoline fuel efficiency for electric-mode operation.

The Palisade is a great midsize SUV. With a focus on family hauling, the Palisade comes packed with standard features that make the SUV a fantastic value. Beyond that, the Palisade impresses with an upscale cabin, a good amount of passenger space and a smooth ride.

Initial deliveries of the 2024 Cadillac LYRIQ are expected to arrive in spring 2023. Prices for the 2024 LYRIQ will be finalized closer to the order date, which hasn't been announced yet. It should start at around the same price as the 2023 model

While the Camaro will not technically have a seventh-generation model, Chevy does plan to send the car off in style. 2024 is set to be the last production year for the Camaro. And Chevy has announced that it will have an exclusive Farewell Package available exclusively on the 2024 Camaro.

BMW Z4 is a 2 seater Convertible available in a price range of â‚¹ 71.82 - 84.83 Lakh. It is available in 2 variants, 1998 to 2998 cc engine options and 1 transmission option : Automatic (TC). Other key specifications of the Z4 include a Ground Clearance of 117 mm, Kerb Weight of 1495 kg and Bootspace of 281 litres.

The Audi TT has 2 Petrol Engine on offer. The Petrol engine is 1984 cc and 3189 cc . It is available with Automatic transmission. Depending upon the variant and fuel type the TT has a mileage of 9.5 to 14.33 kmpl & Ground clearance of TT is 135mm.
